title: Drawing, "Design for a Punch Ladle", 1943
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, upper right: 285.
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, center: CUILLER   ÉPUNCH/ASSORTISANT COUPE A PUNCH No 283./LONGUEUR DU MANCHE 27 cms/DIAMETRE DE LA CUILLER 9 cms, center right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/43.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Ladle drawn in plan and elevation. Round bowl with a long rectangular handle which curves backwards to form a loop bound with three attached bands. Underdrawing in graphite of ladle in golden section.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Punch Ladle", 1943.
1943. Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-10.
